implant.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to strongly fix an idea, feeling, attitude etc in someone’s mind or character
implant.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: A deep sense of patriotism had been implanted in him by his father.
implant.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to put something into someone’s body by performing a medical operation
implant.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Surgeons successfully implanted an artificial hip.
A donor egg fertilised by her husband’s sperm will be implanted in her womb.
implant.translation[0].definitions[2].de: if an egg or embryo implants, it begins to develop normally
implant.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: The fertilized egg implants and becomes a foetus.
implant.translation[1].definitions[0].de: something artificial that is put into someone’s body in a medical operation
